column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////...but I still recommend trying the pizza! It is definitely NOT like UNO's chains. However
column2: do keep in mind that the cooking time will be a while (30- 45 min to make)
column3: so try to distract your hunger with something else if you dont want to eat too much beforehand! I came here around 5-ish on Friday
column4: and by the time I was done with my meal
column5: the place was packed with people coming in for dinner hour (sardines in a can)!
